caseSubject: Colony / Colonization of Govt. Land Act Cases/Grant of Proprietary Rights
caseTitle: Jan Muhammad v. The Member (Cononies)Board of Revenue Punjab, Lahore, etc
tagline: All allottees under the ?Grow More Food Scheme? launched by the Board of Revenue of the then West Pakistan were to be conferred proprietary rights, provided that they had fulfilled the terms and conditions on which temporary leases were granted.
